Class Nutil

      • transform

        public static CoordSet transform​(java.lang.String inDatum,
                                 java.lang.String outDatum,
                                 double lat,
                                 double lon,
                                 double height,
                                 java.lang.String inVertDatum,
                                 java.lang.String outVertDatum,
                                 double orthoHt)
        transforms horizontal and vertical datums
        Parameters:
        inDatum - input horizontal datum
        outDatum - output horizontal datum
        lat - latitude
        lon - longitude
        height - ellipsoid height
        inVertDatum - input vertical datum
        outVertDatum - output vertical datum
        orthoHt - orthometric height
        Returns:
        transformed coordinate

      • transform

        public static CoordSet transform​(java.lang.String inDatum,
                                 java.lang.String outDatum,
                                 double lat,
                                 double lon,
                                 double height)
        transforms horizontal datums
        Parameters:
        inDatum - input datum being transformed
        outDatum - output datum
        lat - latitude being transformed
        lon - longitude being transformed
        height - height being transformed
        Returns:
        coordinate set that contains transformed coordinate

      • getCoordSet

        public static CoordSet getCoordSet​(CoordSet p,
                                   java.lang.String outDatum,
                                   java.lang.String pDatum,
                                   double aParm,
                                   double fParm,
                                   java.lang.String spcZone,
                                   java.lang.String utmZone,
                                   java.lang.String[] coOptions)
                            throws CTException
        Converts transformed geodetic coordinate to SPC,UTM,XYZ,USNG
        Parameters:
        p - container for transformed geodetic coordinate
        outDatum - destination datum
        pDatum - reference datum
        aParm - equatorial radius
        fParm - earth flattening
        spcZone - spc zone for override
        utmZone - utml zone for override
        coOptions - coordinate options
        Returns:
        coordinate set with transformed and converted coordinates
        Throws:
        CTException - if unable to find an SPC zone

      • getDestCoord

        public static double[] getDestCoord​(CoordSet p,
                                    boolean specialCase)
        returns destination coordinate from coordinate set. If no datum transformation occurred, source coordinate is returned
        Parameters:
        p - transformed coordinate
        specialCase - international coordinate
        Returns:
        returns source LLh if no transformation occurred

      • getSpcZone

        public static java.lang.String getSpcZone​(java.lang.String datum,
                                          double lat,
                                          double lon,
                                          java.lang.String pDatum,
                                          boolean zoneOnly)
                                   throws CTException
        returns spc Zone
        Parameters:
        datum - nadcon5 datum
        lat - latitude
        lon - longitude
        pDatum - reference datum used for projection
        zoneOnly - true=returns zone only, false=zone+metadata
        Returns:
        spc zone
        Throws:
        CTException - if unable to retrieve a zone

      • getSpcZone

        public static java.lang.String getSpcZone​(java.lang.String datum,
                                          double lat,
                                          double lon,
                                          java.lang.String pDatum,
                                          SpcUtil spcUtil)
                                   throws CTException
        returns spc Zone- overloaded to use shared resource
        Parameters:
        datum - nadcon5 datum
        lat - latitude
        lon - longitude
        pDatum - reference datum used for projection
        spcUtil - object used for zone determination
        Returns:
        spc zone
        Throws:
        CTException - if unable to retrieve a zone
